challenge.title: Why don't your satisfied customers leave reviews?
challenge.subtitle: The customer satisfaction paradox in tourism and hospitality
challenge.unhappyDesc: Disappointed customers are 3x more motivated to leave a review to complain, dragging down your average.
challenge.silentDesc: They loved their experience but "forget" to leave a review once they leave.
challenge.opportunityDesc: Converting these silent customers into stars puts you in 1st position on Google.

workflow.title: The StarSpin Workflow
workflow.subtitle: 4 simple steps to transform your customers into ambassadors
workflow.step1Desc: Customer scans the QR code to instantly access the experience
workflow.step2Desc: Negative reviews are captured privately for internal improvement
workflow.step3Desc: Satisfied customers spin the wheel to win an instant gift
workflow.step4Desc: The gift expires quickly, encouraging the customer to return soon

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about StarSpin
faq.a1: You print a QR code, the customer scans it, rates their experience. If positive (4-5â˜…), they access the wheel to win an instant gift.
faq.a2: They arrive in your private dashboard. You can handle them internally without affecting your public reputation.
faq.q3: Is it compatible with my POS system?
faq.a3: StarSpin works independently via QR code. No technical integration required.
faq.q4: How much do the gifts cost?
faq.a4: You decide! Free coffee, -10%, free dessert... You control the prizes and their value.
